mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( b_title, b_content, b_writer, b_hit, idx ) VALUES ( #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, 0, #{idx} )
mapper.select: SELECT b_id as bid, b_title as btitle, b_writer as bwriter, b_hit as bhit, b_datetime as bdatetime, idx as idx FROM board
SELECT b_title as btitle, b_writer as bwriter, b_content as bcontent, b_hit as bhit FROM board WHERE b_id = #{bid}
